pkgmetadata.longdescription: A rewrite of what was formerly known as "Open Broadcaster Software", software originally designed for recording and streaming live video content, efficiently. Aims to be multi-platform, and improved upon internally.

use.flag: Enable browser source support via (precompiled) CEF.
Use ImageMagick for image loading instead of FFmpeg.
Build with NVENC encoding support for nVidia video cards.
Build with scripting support for Python 3.
Build with Speex noise suppression filter support.
Build with TLS/SSL support for RTMPS connections.
Build with VLC media source support.
